name: NFDI4Health_LM_Metadataschema_RecordLinkage
title: NFDI4Health Module Record Linkage
description: NFDI4Health Logical Module of Module Record Linkage V3.3.1

element.definition: NFDI4Health Logical Module of Module Record Linkage V3.3.1

element.short: Information about record linkage for the [RESOURCE]
element.definition: Group of items providing information on record linkage.

element.short: Indication whether there are specific regulations/permissions for record linkage.
element.definition: Indication whether there are specific regulations/permissions for record linkage.
element.comment: Additional information: Whether any specific legal regulations/permissions exist (e.g. for social data, for cancer registry data, hospital data, etc.).

element.short: Information specifying which specific legal basis allows for record linkage.
element.definition: Information specifying which specific legal basis allows for record linkage.
element.comment:
Additional information: If existing, any specific legal regulations/permissions (e.g. for social data, for cancer registry data, hospital data, etc.).
* 1..1 1..1, if RecordLinkage.legalBasis == "Yes"
* 0..0 0..0, if RecordLinkage.legalBasis == "No"

element.short: Indication whether an informed consent that allows record linkage has been obtained.
element.definition: Indication whether an informed consent that allows record linkage has been obtained.

element.short: Institutions and authorities that must agree to the record linkage.
element.definition: Institutions and authorities that must agree to the record linkage.

element.short: Indication whether there are additional costs for record linkage.
element.definition: Indication whether there are additional costs for record linkage.

element.short: Identifiers that can be used for record linkage (e.g. names, date of birth, zip code, insurance number or control number as in cancer registries).
element.definition: Identifiers that can be used for record linkage (e.g. names, date of birth, zip code, insurance number or control number as in cancer registries).

element.short: Additional important details for conducting record linkage.
element.definition: Additional important details for conducting record linkage.

element.short: DOIs of additional related resources specific to record linkage (e.g., publications).
element.definition: DOIs of additional related resources specific to record linkage (e.g., publications).
